info.description:
Since there hasen't been a lot of blueberry inflation interactives I decided to make my own.

You decide how they inflate, for instance the gum, a disease thats only affecting the females or a new girl who loves tsukune and is trying to get rid of the competiton. Anything around those lines.

1) No exploding (unless they revert back to their original size)

2) Proper spelling.

3) No bashing about this interactive ( this is my first one so cut me some slack.)

4) No short entries make them atleast more than 4 sentences

5) They can turn into different fruits as long they inflate round.

6) No gay/lesbian, death, or foot worship.

7) Please update and have fun.
